app.name: Makinatna
home.subtitle: Welcome to our site. Explore our projects and updates.
smoke.title: RTL Smoke Test
smoke.paragraphBody: This page helps confirm RTL/LTR alignment across common UI elements. Check spacing, punctuation, and baseline alignment as you scan the content.
smoke.detailsItem2: Numbers and labels keep consistent spacing.
smoke.detailsItem3: Inline icons or markers sit on the baseline.
